div.p: Group 4 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AllergyIntolerance|5.0.0 to FHIR Extensions Packversion: 5.2.0)

tr.td: Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `AllergyIntolerance.participant.actor` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `AllergyIntolerance.participant.actor` has a context of AllergyIntolerance based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `AllergyIntolerance`.
